PICC insertion.sentence: The nurse prepares the sterile field and gathers the necessary equipment for PICC insertion.
PICC insertion.subject: The nurse
PICC insertion.object: the sterile field and the necessary equipment
PICC insertion.tools: PICC catheter, sterile gloves, antiseptic solution, ultrasound machine, dressing supplies

PICC insertion.sentence: The physician cleans the insertion site on the patient's arm with antiseptic solution to reduce the risk of infection.
PICC insertion.subject: The physician
PICC insertion.object: the insertion site on the patient's arm

PICC insertion.sentence: The physician uses ultrasound to identify the vein for optimal catheter placement during the procedure.
PICC insertion.subject: The physician

PICC insertion.sentence: The physician inserts the PICC catheter into the identified vein with the assistance of the nurse.
PICC insertion.subject: The physician
PICC insertion.object: the PICC catheter into the identified vein

PICC insertion.sentence: The nurse secures the catheter with a dressing and provides the patient with post-procedure care instructions.
PICC insertion.subject: The nurse
